item.title: GitHub - quackduck/devzat: The devs are over here at devzat, chat over SSH!
item.description: The devs are over here at devzat, chat over SSH! Contribute to quackduck/devzat development by creating an account on GitHub.
item.author: (quackduck)

item.title: Introducing CoreWCF and WCF Client Azure Queue Storage bindings for .NET - .NET Blog
item.description: The initial beta release of the official libraries Microsoft.CoreWCF.Azure.StorageQueues and Microsoft.WCF.Azure.StorageQueues.Client library for .NET is now available.
item.author: (Subhrajit Saha)

item.title: .NET 6 will reach End of Support on November 12, 2024 - .NET Blog
item.description: .NET 6 will reach end of support on November 12, 2024. This blog post breaks down all the valuable information you need to know and how to update to .NET 8.
item.author: (Rahul Bhandari (MSFT))

item.title: Mistral NeMo
item.description: Mistral NeMo: our new best small model. A state-of-the-art 12B model with 128k context length, built in collaboration with NVIDIA, and released under the Apache 2.0 license.
item.author: (Mistral AI)

item.title: Creating an already-completed asynchronous activity in C++/WinRT, part 8 - The Old New Thing
item.author: (Raymond Chen)

item.title: AI Tooling for Software Engineers in 2024: Reality Check (Part 1)
item.description: How do software engineers utilize GenAI tools in their software development workflow? We sidestep the hype, and look to the reality of tech professionals using LLMs for coding and other tasks.
item.author: (Gergely Orosz)

item.title: NuGetAudit 2.0: Elevating Security and Trust in Package Management - The NuGet Blog
item.description: Introduction In November 2023 (NuGet 6.8, Visual Studio 17.8, .NET SDK 8.0.100), we released NuGet Audit. NuGet Audit provides warnings during restore when a package with a known vulnerability is used by a project. More information about NuGet Audit, including detailed configuration options can be found on our learn website.
item.author: (Andy Zivkovic)

item.title: ASP.NET Core Basics: Dealing with Backend Validations
item.description: Learn how to get started with validations and important tips and resources to help protect the integrity of your web applications and APIs.
